title: Server disconnecting for everyone on my friends list
body: Me and my 3 other friends are trying to start up a lobby, and we all get an attempting to reconnect message and bugs out our client. we had to restart the client and the one guy had to do it 3 times, till it let him connect, i think you guys need to post something about it and that it isnt our connection because for it to happen to 4 people at once doesn't sound like a me issue.

replies.body: its happening to me too bro idk what to do
Same, I load in and have to disconnect bc game is always trying to Attempt to reconnect then a service status message pops up.

We're investigating issues where some players keep disconnecting, and have a [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) message out where we'll be providing updates.  In the meantime ranked queue is disabled while we work towards a resolution.  Hang tight!
